column5: Now thats what i'm talkin about !!! The ice is braking up all along the river here too.Vast expanses of open water, calling my name.Sigh............. Every time we pass by the launch, the wife says"I can hear the fishies calling"
Can't wait to get the boat out of storage ... thanks for making me even more antsy!
I'm getting such an itch to fish....its bugging me!!!

i managed to get out and make a few casts at lasalle park here in burlington yesterday, it felt great!!! gonna head down there for an hour or so again today after work...much needed after the day ive had
You might have some company, as this was my plan as well!
